name: Guilt of the Sinful Spoils
effectText: If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) from the Deck or Extra Deck and you control a "Diabellstar" Monster Card (except during the Damage Step): Target 1 monster your opponent controls; shuffle it into the Deck. During the Damage Step, when your "Diabellstar" monster battles an opponent's monster: You can banish this card from your GY; that opponent's monster's ATK becomes halved until the end of this turn. You can only use each effect of "Guilt of the Sinful Spoils" once per turn.
